# init

Minimal init(8) for use with Docker. Wraps your command
to reap zombie processes.

Heavily influenced by [Xe/init](https://github.com/Xe/init)

## Installation

    $ go get github.com/ddollar/init

## Usage

    $ init /path/to/subcommand args
